## Required documents:
- Receipts for transportation/lodging. 
- A filled [Travel reimbursement PDF form](files/Travelreimbursementform.pdf)

**Please Submit above documents through** [Submission_Link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdyrfyg2fQ36ao0fChVgRaNczODZ-5RcdQlbyN5C4Q_hmtUyQ/viewform?usp=publish-editor)

## General Process
### Step 1: Vendor registration email
::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}

Each attendee will receive an email invitation to register as a vendor in PaymentWorks.
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}
![](files/invitation_email.png){width=90% fig-alt="Vendor registration invitation email"}
:::

:::

### Step 2: Register your account
::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}

After completing the registration form, you will receive an activation email and log in again to continue.
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}
![](files/register1.png){width=90% fig-alt="Vendor registration screen"}
:::

:::

### Step 3: Multi-Factor Authentication
::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}

You will be asked to complete multi-factor authentication using your phone number.
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}
![](files/multifactor.png){width=90% fig-alt="Multi-factor authentication screen"}
:::

:::

### Final step: Complete forms based on your tax residency
Use the tabs above to choose your category (US Individual or International Individual). 

After registration, internal review, and approval, you will be set up as a vendor and ready for payment or reimbursement.
